Articles.Content: Hi guys. I'm not asking for a date or anything like that, I'm just worried something is wrong with my steam. Rock Paper Shotgun reviewed 0.22 almost a month ago and I see 0.22 videos all over the net but I am still on 0.21. Is it out and my Steam is messed up?
go to the main kerbal website for updates. They haven't even announced .22 for testing yet. no worries

Indeed, if it was out, there would be an announcement on the website

/thread
